Laborator_3_Structures.Problema_Studient

Class TestStudient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Laborator_3_Structures.Problema_Studient.TestStudient

  • public class TestStudient
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class impliments a Test Container, in where we create objects Studient. There we have methos that will draw to user a simple menu.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String answer
      This variable is changing in independes of User,in menu() and menu2() it is set on "Retry" that will be a flag for some methods.
      static int choose
      This variable is used on switchin user's choose in Menu.
      static java.util.Scanner in
      Scanner will scan the input Stream from keyboard
      static int NumberOfStudient
      Size of array of students.

      TestStudient() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void aboutProgram()
      About Program for User.
      static void changeElement()
      In this function we call second menu2()
      static void getAnswer()
      This function is checking that answer on user.
      static void inputSizeOfStud()
      In this function is initialized array with NumberOfStudient.First of all we create String an input it.After it we check this string if this is number with isNumber(String).If check is True String is parsed to integer and setted to NumberOfStudient.After all this we input information of all students.
      static boolean isNumber(java.lang.String s) 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      In main are called methods
      static void menu()
      Draw a simple menu.Set by default answer "Retry".Input the choose of user independence of menu.
      static void menu2()
      Second menu Draw another menu with options of changing some elements of each Object Student
      static void printStud()
      Function that will print list of all Students inputed by User.
      static void setChoose()
      switching the choose of user in different cases.
      static void setChoose2()
      Switching the choose of user in dependence of second menu2().

      • inputSizeOfStud

        public static void inputSizeOfStud()
        In this function is initialized array with NumberOfStudient.First of all we create String an input it.After it we check this string if this is number with isNumber(String).If check is True String is parsed to integer and setted to NumberOfStudient.After all this we input information of all students.

      • getAnswer

        public static void getAnswer()
        This function is checking that answer on user.

        switching the choose of user in different cases.

      • menu

        public static void menu()
        Draw a simple menu.Set by default answer "Retry".Input the choose of user independence of menu. Call setChoose().
